description.en: The course covers the following topics: people's health behaviour, risk in health and health insurance, health services demand and supply, health technologies financing, health technologies assessment and different assessments methods, overview of Estonian health care system. Course consists of lectures and seminars, where students present their homework (report)..
description.et: Kursusel käsitletakse järgmisi teemasid: inimese tervisekäitumist, riskid tervises ja tervisekindlustust, tervishoiuteenuse nõudluse ja pakkumise kujunemist, tervishoiutehnoloogiate finantseerimise kujunemist, majanduslike meetodite kasutamist tervishoiutehnoloogiate hindamisel, Eesti tervishoiusüsteemi toimimist. Kursus koosneb loengutest ja kahest seminarist, kus kantakse ette seminaritöö (referaat).

objectives.en: The aim of the course is to introduce the basics of health economics and the use of economic analysis elements in the healthcare field. Those who complete the course will gain an overview of health economics and economic evaluation.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärk on tutvustada terviseökonoomika aluseid ja majandusanalüüsi elementide kasutamise võimalusi tervishoiuvaldkonnas. Kursuse läbinud saavad ülevaate tervishoiuökonoomikast ja majanduslikust hindamisest.

learning_outcomes.en: Upon completion of the course the student:
1) knows how to use elements of health analysis to analyse health field issues;
learning_outcomes.et: 1) oskab rakendada majandusanalüüsi elemente tervise analüüsimisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows how to use elements of health analysis to analyse health care field issues;
learning_outcomes.et: 2) oskab rakendada majandusanalüüsi elemente tervishoiuvaldkonna analüüsimisel;

learning_outcomes.en: 3) has an overview principles of health insurance;
4) has an overview of health care financing;
5) knows how to use health technologies assessment methods;
learning_outcomes.et: 5) oskab rakendada esmaseid tervishoiutehnoloogiate hindamise metoodikaid;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) has an overview principles of Estonian health care system.
